resources.string:
Welcome on the MangaForEver project.
MangaForEver aims to create a complete and personalized application for mangas fans.
 ...Read confortably a maximum of mangas from differents sources ... 
 ... Have the possibility to get informations about a specific character ... 
 ... interesting forum links about the current arc... 
 ... or Youtube videos about the chapter your are reading ... 
 All these objectives are our priorities.
If you like this project idea, check the next box and clic on "I enter".
Oh oh, you had not checked the box \"I like this project idea\".
